results.overview: Following their explosive showdown, Godzilla and Kong must unite against a colossal undiscovered threat hidden within the Hollow Earth, one that threatens to shatter the very foundations of their world.
results.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire

results.overview: Several generations after Caesar's reign, apes are the dominant species and live harmoniously, while humans have been reduced to a feral state. As a new tyrannical ape leader builds his empire, one young ape embarks on a harrowing journey that will cause him to question all that he has known about the past and to make choices that will define a future for apes and humans alike.
results.title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes

results.overview: In a post-war Japan, a new terror emerges. Godzilla, a monstrous creature, attacks the country, bringing it to its knees. In the face of unprecedented despair, who will stand against this devastating force, and how will Japan fight back?
results.title: Godzilla Minus One

results.overview: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against those who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the known universe, he endeavors to prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.
results.title: Dune: Part Two

results.overview: An ex-special forces operative is forced to fight his way through the criminal underworld to save his kidnapped niece.
results.title: Black Lotus

results.overview: Po is to become the spiritual leader of the Valley of Peace, but he needs to find and train a new Dragon Warrior before he can do so. Meanwhile, a wicked sorceress plans to re-access all the master villains whom Po has vanquished to the spirit realm.
results.title: Kung Fu Panda 4

results.overview: Snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers, young Furiosa is captured by a great Biker Horde led by the Warlord Dementus. Sweeping through the Wasteland, they encounter the Citadel presided over by The Immortan Joe. As the two Tyrants battle for dominance, Furiosa must survive many trials as she puts together the means to find her way home.
results.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga

results.overview: A 12-year-old girl discovers a mysterious spider that quickly grows into a monstrous creature, trapping her family and neighbors in their apartment building.
results.title: Sting

results.overview: The Spengler family returns to the iconic New York City firehouse to team up with the original Ghostbusters, who've developed a top-secret research lab to take ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artifact unleashes a powerful force, both teams must join forces to protect their home and save the world from a second Ice Age.
results.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire

results.overview: Recognizing the destructive power of the giant ape, Abraham, NASA designs a mechanical ape to match his strength and size. However, when the first test results are unsatisfactory, the U.S. Department of Defense orders the release of Abraham from prison to stop the rampaging mechanical ape. Meanwhile, the Volodretska foreign intelligence agency plans to attach a nuclear warhead to the mechanical ape and disrupt its system to destroy Chicago. To prevent this, NASA officials try to communicate with Abraham to stop the mechanical ape.
results.title: Ape vs. Mecha Ape
สลิธ โปรเจกต์ล่า

results.overview: Garfield, the world-famous, Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, is about to have a wild outdoor adventure! After an unexpected reunion with his long-lost father – scruffy street cat Vic – and his canine pal Odie, Garfield is forced from his perfectly pampered life into joining Vic on a hilarious, high-stakes heist.
results.title: The Garfield Movie

results.overview: A former military doctor finds herself in a deadly battle for survival when the Irish mafia takes over the hospital where she works. With her son's life on the line, she realizes there's no one to save him but herself, forcing her to rely on her battle-hardened past and lethal skills.
results.title: Mercy

results.overview: Tashi, a former tennis prodigy turned coach, has transformed her husband Art into a Grand Slam champion. To jolt him out of a losing streak, she makes him play a 'Challenger' event where he finds himself facing off against the once-promising, now burnt-out Patrick – his former best friend and Tashi’s former boyfriend.
results.title: Challengers

results.overview: A plane crashes into the Pacific Ocean, leaving a handful of survivors trapped in an air pocket. But as their oxygen supply dwindles, a new danger emerges: a school of hungry sharks.
results.title: No Way Up

results.overview: A mythic and emotionally charged hero's journey, 'Dune' tells the story of Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, who must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people.
results.title: Dune

results.overview: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer’s role in the development of the atomic bomb during World War II.
results.title: Oppenheimer
